summary: Mad Max is an exciting movie series from Australia, started in 1979 by George Miller. It's about a tough guy named Max Rockatansky, who lives in a future where the world has gone crazy and resources are scarce. Max, first played by Mel Gibson, becomes a lone traveler in this dangerous world, helping people in trouble as he goes. The series is known for its wild action and has become very popular, even winning some big awards. There are now five movies, with the latest, *Furiosa*, released in 2024.
title: Mad Max
